quote_first: He looked up at the foyer clock:
quote_last: . He walked quickly across to the lifts, checked his tie in the mirror and took a deep breath. The clock struck twice, the lift doors opened and out stepped Mr. Morita and his two colleagues.
title: Be Careful What You Wish For
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: You are four minutes too slow. No matter; it’s enough to mention the error. Now from this moment,
quote_last: , this Wednesday, 2nd October, you are in my service.
title: Around the World in Eighty Days
author: Jules Verne

quote_last: . He would make time to visit the monuments in St. George’s church in Bradwell, but after that brief visit there would be no possible excuse for not driving back to London to lunch at New Scotland Yard.
title: Original Sin
author: P.D. James
